title: What is "Dissociation of Mists" and the Effects of Potentiation on Individual Condition?
first_phrase: In this final section, the author discusses the concept of "potenziamento" (strengthening) and its effects on the individual. They explain how the action of rituals and disciplines can lead to the dissociation of the individual's components, which results in a new flow of energy. This amplification can make it necessary for individuals to achieve a state of effective balance before engaging in transformative practices. Using examples, they highlight the importance of being able to elevate one's power of control to match the increased energy. The author also touches upon the potential effects of potenziamento on an individual's central power or overall tendency.
